extension.searchTitle: LAWSUIT ABUSE REDUCTION ACT OF 2017; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 42

congVote.result: So the motion to recommit was rejected.

congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Read a letter from the Speaker wherein he appointed Representative Jenkins (WV) to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.<P/>Lawsuit Abuse Reduction Act of 2017: The House passed H.R. 720, to amend Rule 11 of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure to improve attorney accountability, by a recorded vote of 230 ayes to 188 noes, Roll No. 158.
